title: The pattern holds
author: VD
content_html:
Republican scandals always seem to involve sex, Democratic scandals always seem to involve money:

Gov. Mark Sanford admitted today that his secret trip to Argentina over Father’s Day weekend was to visit a woman he is having an affair with.

Not that I was ever buying it, but this should put an end any presidential speculation about the guy. I did like his attempt to turn down the stimulus money, though.
content_text:
Republican scandals
always seem to involve sex
, Democratic scandals always seem to involve money:
Gov. Mark Sanford admitted today that his secret trip to Argentina over Father’s Day weekend was to visit a woman he is having an affair with.
Not that I was ever buying it, but this should put an end any presidential speculation about the guy.  I did like his attempt to turn down the stimulus money, though.
